Item.dialogue1: The world is being consumed by a dark disease. My health is fading.
Item.dialogue2: There are portals scattered about the world, they lead to unknown places
Item.dialogue3: It is dangerous to go alone. Take this.
Item.dialogue4: My aura has helped me overcome my fears
Item.dialogue5: You can use it to help you overcome yours. Go through this portal, finish what I never could.
